io.grpc

Class TransportManager<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.grpc.TransportManager<T>

  • @ExperimentalApi(value="https://github.com/grpc/grpc-java/issues/1781")
public abstract class TransportManager<T>
extends Object
    Manages transport life-cycles and provide ready-to-use transports.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  TransportManager.InterimTransport<T>
      A transport provided as a temporary holder of new requests, which will be eventually transferred to real transports or fail.
      static interface  TransportManager.OobTransportProvider<T>
      A provider for out-of-band transports, usually used by a load-balancer that needs to communicate with an external load-balancing service which is under an authority different from what the channel is associated with.

      Constructor and Description
      TransportManager()

      abstract T getTransport(EquivalentAddressGroup addressGroup)
      Returns a transport for any of the addresses from the given address group.
      abstract Channel makeChannel(T transport)
      Returns a channel that uses transport; useful for issuing RPCs on a transport.
      abstract void updateRetainedTransports(Collection<EquivalentAddressGroup> addrs)
      Advises this TransportManager to retain transports only to these servers, for warming up connections and discarding unused connections.

      • updateRetainedTransports

        public abstract void updateRetainedTransports(Collection<EquivalentAddressGroup> addrs)
        Advises this TransportManager to retain transports only to these servers, for warming up connections and discarding unused connections.

      • getTransport

        public abstract T getTransport(EquivalentAddressGroup addressGroup)
        Returns a transport for any of the addresses from the given address group.

        Never returns null

      • createFailingTransport

        public abstract T createFailingTransport(Status error)
        Creates a transport that would fail all RPCs with the given error.

      • createInterimTransport

        public abstract TransportManager.InterimTransport<T> createInterimTransport()
        Returns a transport that is not associated with any address. It holds RPCs until it's closed, at which moment all held RPCs are transferred to actual transports.

        This method is typically used in lieu of getTransport(io.grpc.EquivalentAddressGroup) before server addresses are known.

        The returned interim transport is tracked by this TransportManager. You must call TransportManager.InterimTransport.closeWithRealTransports(com.google.common.base.Supplier<T>) or TransportManager.InterimTransport.closeWithError(io.grpc.Status) when it's no longer used, so that TransportManager can get rid of it.

      • createOobTransportProvider

        public abstract TransportManager.OobTransportProvider<T> createOobTransportProvider(EquivalentAddressGroup addressGroup,
                                                                                    String authority)
        Creates an TransportManager.OobTransportProvider with a specific authority.

      • makeChannel

        public abstract Channel makeChannel(T transport)
        Returns a channel that uses transport; useful for issuing RPCs on a transport.
